attributes.action: Manufacturing UK Group calls upon UK Government to establish a single portal for support and funding
attributes.additional_details:
UK Industry continues to be diverse, with little co-ordination across sector organisations, If there is the message is not reaching the grass-roots of industry. The current silo approach delivers uncoordinated messages into UK Government.

 Key Issues
There have been 22 issues identified by the Group which can be distilled down into 3 overarching catagories.
1.	Training
a.	Apprenticeships
b.	Education
i.	Attraction of young talent
2.	Finance
a.	Taxation
b.	Investment
c.	Energy costs
3.	Productivity
a.	Competitiveness
i.	Quality
b.	Technology
c.	Protection
The relationship to Europe and the Euro did not appear to be a high priority issue.
